title: Holiday Office Hours
summary: Modified hours for Presidents Day weekend
body:
Our office will have modified hours for the Presidents Day holiday:

Friday, Feb 14: Normal hours (9am-5pm)
Saturday, Feb 15: Closed
Sunday, Feb 16: Closed
Monday, Feb 17 (Presidents Day): Closed
Tuesday, Feb 18: Normal hours resume

For urgent matters during the closure, please email emergency@example.com.
